overview: Helg Sgarbi, a charming Swiss man, tries to extort 14 million Euro from BMWâ€™s major shareholder Susanne Klatten by threatening to publish intimate photos. She contacts the police, Sgarbi is arrested. But this case is only the tip of the proverbial iceberg: Several gullible women were blackmailed by Sgarbi. The money probably went to an Italian miraclehealer and his sect. Is he the mastermind behind the crime?
title: Seduced and Blackmailed
